'''The Outlander Who Caught the Wind''' (formerly ''The Wind Catcher from a Foreign Land'') is a soundtrack from the album ''[[The Wind and The Star Traveler]]''.

It was featured in the following promotional videos:
* ''[https://youtu.be/lMdsrZ1otlA Genshin Impact Announcement Trailer - The Outlander Who Caught The Wind]''
* ''[https://youtu.be/SY3XGzDousM Version 1.0 Gameplay Trailer]''
* ''[https://youtu.be/SxGma3zMzgo Promotional Video - Together on a Long Journey]''
